oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Anthony Joyce interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Minser, Billy
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Corporal Anthony “Tony” Joyce was with the 1st Battalion 3rd Marines, 3rd Marine Division, 1964-1965. It was the first combat battalion to land and fight in the Vietnam War. This interview was conducted February 26, 2020, at the Blount County Public Library by William Minser and Ed Caudill. Audio interview: http://bit.ly/vv-anthonyjoyce
